sources.title: The City Slicker (1938)
sources.description: Scrappy, the city slicker, goes to visit his country cousin. Scrappy is a practical joker and carries an electrical buzzer in his hand, and water-squirting bouquets in his button hole. But his country cousin is not as dumb as Scrappy thinks, and some of Scrappy's jokes backfire on him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-city-slicker-1938/

metadata.Plot: Scrappy, the city slicker, goes to visit his country cousin. Scrappy is a practical joker and carries an electrical buzzer in his hand, and water-squirting bouquets in his button hole. But his country cousin is not as dumb as Scrappy thinks, and some of Scrappy's jokes backfire on him.
metadata.Actors: Shirley Reed, Danny Webb, Robert Winkler
